title: CA CLE Accredited Webinar: Law Marketing Ethics Issues in a Race for Clients
description: In our next Justia Webinar, Micah Buchdahl, attorney and president of HTMLawyers, Inc., will discuss the intricacies of law firm competition in a fast-moving marketplace where the Rules of Professional Conduct vary by state in both regulation and enforcement. This presentation is approved for 1 hour of Legal Ethics MCLE Credit in California. Please note that CA MCLE credit is only available for Justia Connect Pros.
